name: BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York, as Trustee for the Certificate Holders of CWALT, Inc. Alternative Loan Trust 2005-86CB, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificate Series 2005-86cb c/o Bank of America, N.A., Respondent v. Dorothy HARTMAN, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Bank of New York Mellon f/k/a Bank of New York v. Hartman

parties: BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York, as Trustee for the Certificate Holders of CWALT, Inc. Alternative Loan Trust 2005-86CB, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificate Series 2005-86cb c/o Bank of America, N.A., Respondent v. Dorothy HARTMAN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of September, 2015, the Application for Extraordinary Relief or Bang’s Bench Jurisdiction is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
